name: Iceland
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the land of fire and ice!
startIntroPart2: This is an example nation for the mods feature. Let our rich culture and natural beauty inspire you!
declaringWar: You have stirred the volcanoes of our wrath! Prepare for a fierce battle!
attacked: You dare challenge us? Prepare to feel the chill of our defense!
defeated: How could our mighty glaciers be shattered? The sagas will remember this defeat.
introduction: As proud Icelanders, our heritage and landscapes are unmatched.
afterPeace: Very well, peace is the best path for both of us.
tradeRequest: We offer you the bounty of our land in this trade offer.
